timeline.message: Refactoring - moving the request exceution logic to a separate class and add tests
Invoke responseHandler#onError when the request future is cancelled

timeline.bodyText: Do we need a WireMock test here to test the situation when the request is executed successfully?
timeline.author: Quanzzzz

replies.bodyText: This test is not using wiremock, but yeah, I can add a test for happy path

timeline.bodyText: Question: Where do we use these two classes: RecordingNetworkTrafficListener and RecordingResponseHandler? Are they for the normal case test?
